name: Attak DED!
description:
By: Mr.Dominoo & Radicalmethodz

You Play as Dr.Roboto the rejected medical unit and your goal is to get out of the dump while ATTAK enemy units and collecting shekels  for a fake medical licence!

Controls:

  • A+D : Movement
  • Space : Jump+Double Jump
  • J : Attak!
  • K : DED Shot

The game is made up,so do not be afraid to go to the doctors. Not all medical Bots are rejected, and not all of them can make you DED!

We developed the game for a game jam with the beginner skills we have,and put quite a lot of effort to try to make the design uniqe filled with personality. Please leave a feedback so we will have the motivation to do more of these game jams.

And make sure you Attak DED!
